movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ravi Kishore Chandina
Starring by: Amar, Santoshi, Tanikella Bharani
Genres: Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Amar, an NRI, comes to India on a research and stays with his friend Sastri. Amar often gets a dream, in which he’s threatened by a lady ghost to kill him with the help of five elements and he’d really die on the fifth time. Sastri suggests him to meet a psychologist – witch man, who can suggest him a solution to get rid of this.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Prem Bhagirath
Starring by: Ajay Aman, Ambika, Jhansi
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ajay is a happy-go-lucky spoil brat. Ajay gets into rivalry with Vikram who is his opponent in college. Ajay falls for Vikram’s sister, Nandini, who reciprocates his love. Misunderstandings lead Nandini to hate Ajay. How Ajay wins Nandini and convinces both the families forms the plot of Ajay Passayyadu.

movieInfo:
Directed by: JP Sravan Kumar
Starring by: Vikranth singh, Bhanu Prakash
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Group of friends (Vikranth singh, Bhanu Prakash & others) who are keen to make short films in Huzurabad, where people living in dire conditions resulting in them winning the contest. However, the local leaders warn them not to interfere. One of the friends contests in the elections. The local leaders kill his family and him.The rest of the story is what he does and how the story goes from hereon.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Omar
Written by: Sarang Jayaprakash
Starring by: Priya Prakash Varrier, Roshan Abdul Rahoof, Noorin Shereef
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: At once a musical love story and a coming-of-age drama, Oru Adaar Love follows the life and times of a group of schoolmates who are best buddies. As they journey through the most memorable times of their lives, lasting friendships are forged and extraordinary tales of romance blossom.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Nelson Venkatesan
Starring by: Dinesh Ravi, Nivetha Pethuraj, Miya George
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Three women face challenges in their process of getting married. Rajkumar (Dinesh), who is in love with his colleague Kavya (Nivetha Pethuraj), is reluctant to marry her, owing to her superior economic background, so much so that he delays talks of marriage. Lakshmi (Miya) is visited by several suitors, and every one of them is rejected by her father (Nagineedu), whose greediness makes him wait every time for a suitor who is per the family’s status. Bhaskar (Lingesh) agrees to marry Susheela (Riythvika) but gets cold feet and calls off the marriage. The story unfolds, telling how each of the protagonists attempts to fight the dogma of arranged marriage.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anil Gopireddy
Starring by: Sharath Sreerangam, Karunya Chowdary, Anil Gopi Reddy
Genres: Drama, Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A Parapsychologist from the USA starts living in an abandoned Villa to solve a mystery about that house. He learns about a shocking incident that happened in that house a few months ago! What is that incident? Did he solve the mystery? The answers lie in this horror-drama directed by Anil Gopi Reddy.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rajiv Menon
Written by: Rajiv Menon
Starring by: G.V. Prakash Kumar, Nedumudi Venu, Aparna Balamurali
Genres: Drama, Music
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Peter(GV Prakash) belongs to a backward class who makes the classical instrument Mridangam. After wasting his life in fan wars, Peter somehow develops an interest in learning Karnatic music. He tries hard to join the school owned the prestigious Karnatic guru(Nedumudi Venu) but he does not get a seat. He follows his instinct and somehow gets a place in his camp. He trains hard to shine but because of a fight involving his batchmate, Peter gets thrown out of the school by his guru.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Alluri Krishnam Raju
Starring by: Natarajan , Surya, Vital, Giridhar
Genres: Biography
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: KCR is not only a renowned politician but also a statehood activist. He left a good impression in the field of politics. He appears to have striven for the formation of a separate state of Telangana, which had a tendency to widen. He changed the face of Telangana and put the interest of all people in his heart when he took the plunge into politics.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Reddem Yadha Kumar
Starring by: Gopichand, Aishwarya Addala
Genres: Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nethra is a girl who doesn’t believe in love and gives a word to her father to marry the person he chooses for her. But she always sees a man in her dreams who meets her after killing a girl. One day she meets the same person in real life and is shaken and starts avoiding him. Soon she learns he is a nice guy and falls for him. Suddenly a spooky story unfolds revealing horrifying ghostly secrets.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sanjay Karthik
Starring by: Viswanat Duddumpudi, Pallak Lalwani, Saranya
Genres: Comedy, Romance, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: An IAS aspirant, Abhinav (Vishwanth) falls in love with a final year graduate student, Spandana (Palak Lalwani). He leaves no rock unturned to win her love but under an unavoidable circumstance, he has to let the relationship go. How does the girl take this news? What happens next is this youthful Romantic Drama, ‘Crazy Crazy Feeling’.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sateesh Chandra Nadella
Starring by: Srinivasa Sai, Priyanka Jain, Uttej
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Fed up with Ramana’s(Srinivas Sai) aggressive behavior in the village, his family decides to migrate to a peaceful place. After shifting to the new place, Ramana falls for a girl called Sulochana(Priyanka Jain). On the other hand, Ramana finds a true friend in a dead soul named Suri.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Satyavarapu Venkateswararao
Starring by: Manoj Nandan, Priya Singh, Posani Krishna Murali
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sreemukhi (Priya Singh) decides to end her life after receiving a strange call. It is later learnt that it was a prank call by Arya (Manoj Nandan), who works for a TV channel. Arya and Sreemukhi turn out to be friends and decide to get married. After a series of events, misunderstandings arise between Arya and Sreemukhi. How they tackle the differences and unite forms the plot of Manasainodu.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Srinivasa Rao Jonnalagadda
Starring by: Akshita, Akshitha, Jonnalagadda Harikrishna
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Prementha Panichese Narayana is a Telugu movie starring Hari Krishna Jonnalagadda and Akshitha in prominent roles. It is a drama romance directed by Jonnalagadda Srinivasa Rao.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sathyanarayana Ekari
Starring by: Lucky Ekari, Naziya, Suman Shetty
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Moni is an action love and romantic and survival movie. Moni, who got engaged with his relative, on the same day she will go to PUB with her lover. They will fight with villan because she will be flirted by them. They will escape and reach to one of the big waterfalls. Unfortunately Moni will fell into waterfalls and reaches to an Island. The film revolve around how she survived in that Island etc

movieInfo:
Directed by: PLK Reddy
Starring by: Taraka Ratna, Prasanth
Genres: Drama, Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Ram (Prashanth) is a cab driver. He kidnaps a high caste doctor and another mediator. Slowly, as the film moves forward, we are shown the reasons behind the kidnap. What are those? Who’s Ram? Why did he do this? Forms the story of the movie.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Rajath Ravishankar
Starring by: Karthi, Rakul Preet Singh, Prakash Raj
Genres: Action, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A youngster who has to fight against all the odds in order to achieve his desires. Born with a silver spoon, Dev (Karthi) is an adventure lover who believes that life is not about earning money, as he does nothing but travels all over the world and experience new things. His two childhood friends (Amrutha and Vigneshkanth) push him into another adventure called “Love” and encourage him to fall in love with multi-millionaire businesswoman Meghna Padmavathy (Rakul Preet Singh) who is completely in contrast to him.
